channel.title: Comentários sobre: Handwritten digit recognition – Part1

item.title: Por: Condensed News | Data Analytics & R
item.dc:creator: Condensed News | Data Analytics & R
item.description: […] Handwritten digit recognition Handwritten digit recognition task was one of first great successes of machine learning methods. Nowadays, the task can be carried out by multiple specialized libraries with very high accuracy (> 97% of correct answers), such that many times, despite of indirectly we use these features in tablets and smartphones, in general we do not know exactly how the method works. […]
item.content:encoded: […] Handwritten digit recognition Handwritten digit recognition task was one of first great successes of machine learning methods. Nowadays, the task can be carried out by multiple specialized libraries with very high accuracy (> 97% of correct answers), such that many times, despite of indirectly we use these features in tablets and smartphones, in general we do not know exactly how the method works. […]
